		Appears in
	
	God of War: Ghost of Sparta

Erinys (Greek: Ἐρινύς) was the daughter of Thanatos, God of Death, and she served as his messenger. She is the Goddess of Vengeance and Death who serves as the secondary antagonist in God of War: Ghost of Sparta.

biographicalInformation.status: Deceased (Stabbed in the back by Kratos with the Blades of Athena)
